fields.text: Thank you for calling Disqus, based in San Francisco, helping publishers increase engagement and build loyal audiences.
Press [INDEX] for Sales and Partnerships to learn about our B2B solutions.
Press [INDEX] to speak with our New Business Sales team.
Please hold while we connect you to New Business Sales.
Press [INDEX] to follow up on your Existing Account.
Please hold while we connect you to your Account Manager.
Press [INDEX] for Technical Support with Disqus integration.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.
Press [INDEX] for Billing and Account Inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing team.
